title: Remove CCS logo from site

requirements.text: Remove the CCS logo image from the header brand area so the navigation header displays brand text only (no logo image).
acceptanceCriteria: The header brand area still provides a clickable control to scroll to the Home section.
Header layout remains aligned and visually balanced on mobile and desktop breakpoints.

requirements.text: Remove the CCS logo image from the footer brand block so the footer displays brand text only (no logo image).
acceptanceCriteria: Footer brand block spacing/alignment looks correct without the image.

requirements.text: Remove the CCS favicon reference so the site no longer uses the generated CCS logo favicon.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer references /assets/generated/ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png as the favicon.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change any backend (Motoko) logic or data models.
Do not rename the company text or rewrite site copy; only remove logo imagery/favicon references.
